biotools.summary:
Rendering glycans and annotating glycopeptide mass spectra.

Find information on common issues.

Ask questions and find answers from other users.

gpAnnotate: A program for the detailed annotation of MS/MS glycoproteomics spectra using DrawGlycan-SNFG sketches.

The Glycopeptide Spectrum Annotation program ( gpAnnotate ) is designed to annotate individual glycoproteomics MS/MS spectrum for several established mass spectrometry fragmentation modes:

bioschemas.name: gpAnnotate
